titleInfo.title: 11 Year Anniversary of Billy Block's Western Beat (Sep. 5)

mods.accessCondition: This digital image is the property of the Country Music Hall of FameÂ® and Museum and is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this file, contact print@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite image information in email.
mods.abstract: One color window card (black on split fountain, yellow to blue) announcing the 11 Year Anniversary of Billy Block's Western Beat American Music Showcase featuring Wendy Waldman, Kenny Edwards, Lowen and Navarro, The Bum Steers, Harmony Ranch, Jerry Fuller, Anne McCue, Mark Islam, Eddie Cunningham, Paul Marshall, Judy Toy, Mojo Monkeys, Jenny Yates, Ed Berghoff, and Craig Lackey hosted by Billy Block at Highland Ground in Hollywood, California on September 5. Poster features a metal photoplate of the Western Beat logo.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
